00046 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00047 
00048 #include <linux/xattr.h>
00049 #include <obd_class.h>
00050 #include <lustre_nodemap.h>

00054 
00055 /* return EADATA length to the caller. negative value means error */
00056 static int mdt_getxattr_pack_reply(struct mdt_thread_info * info)
00057 {
00058         struct req_capsule     *pill = info->mti_pill ;
00059         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00060         char                   *xattr_name;
00061         __u64                   valid;
00062         static const char       user_string[] = "user.";
00063         int                     size, rc;
00064         ENTRY;
00065 
00066         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_GETXATTR_PACK))
00067                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00068 
00069         valid = info->mti_body->mbo_valid & (OBD_MD_FLXATTR | OBD_MD_FLXATTRLS);
00070 
00071         /* Determine how many bytes we need */
00072         if (valid == OBD_MD_FLXATTR) {
00073                 xattr_name = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_NAME);
00074                 if (!xattr_name)
00075                         RETURN(-EFAULT);
00076 
00077                 if (!(exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_XATTR) &&
00078                     !strncmp(xattr_name, user_string, sizeof(user_string) - 1))
00079                         RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
00080 
00081                 size = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env,
00082                                     mdt_object_child(info->mti_object),
00083                                     &LU_BUF_NULL, xattr_name);
00084         } else if (valid == OBD_MD_FLXATTRLS) {
00085                 size = mo_xattr_list(info->mti_env,
00086                                      mdt_object_child(info->mti_object),
00087                                      &LU_BUF_NULL);
00088         } else if (valid == OBD_MD_FLXATTRALL) {
00089                 /* N.B. eadatasize = 0 is not valid for FLXATTRALL */
00090                 /* We could calculate accurate sizes, but this would
00091                  * introduce a lot of overhead, let's do it later... */
00092                 size = info->mti_body->mbo_eadatasize;
00093                 req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_EAVALS, RCL_SERVER, size);
00094                 req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_EAVALS_LENS, RCL_SERVER, size);
00095         } else {
00096                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Valid bits: "LPX64"\n",
00097                        info->mti_body->mbo_valid);
00098                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00099         }
00100 
00101         if (size == -ENODATA) {
00102                 size = 0;
00103         } else if (size < 0) {
00104                 if (size != -EOPNOTSUPP)
00105                         CERROR("Error geting EA size: %d\n", size);
00106                 RETURN(size);
00107         }
00108 
00109         req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_SERVER,
00110                              info->mti_body->mbo_eadatasize == 0 ? 0 : size);
00111         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(pill);
00112         if (rc) {
00113                 LASSERT(rc < 0);
00114                 RETURN(rc);
00115         }
00116 
00117         RETURN(size);
00118 }
00119 
00120 static int
00121 mdt_getxattr_one(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00122                 char *xattr_name, struct md_object *next,
00123                 struct lu_buf *buf, struct mdt_export_data *med,
00124                 struct lu_ucred *uc)
00125 {
00126         __u32 remote = exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp);
00127         int flags = CFS_IC_NOTHING, rc;
00128 
00129         ENTRY;
00130 
00131         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "getxattr %s\n", xattr_name);
00132 
00133         rc = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env, next, buf, xattr_name);
00134         if (rc < 0)
00135                 GOTO(out, rc);
00136 
00137         if (info->mti_body->mbo_valid &
00138             (OBD_MD_FLRMTLSETFACL | OBD_MD_FLRMTLGETFACL))
00139                 flags = CFS_IC_ALL;
00140         else if (info->mti_body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLRMTRGETFACL)
00141                 flags = CFS_IC_MAPPED;
00142 
00143         if (rc > 0 && flags != CFS_IC_NOTHING) {
00144                 int rc1;
00145 
00146                 if (unlikely(!remote))
00147                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00148 
00149                 rc1 = lustre_posix_acl_xattr_id2client(uc,
00150                                 med->med_idmap,
00151                                 (posix_acl_xattr_header *)(buf->lb_buf),
00152                                 rc, flags);
00153                 if (unlikely(rc1 < 0))
00154                         rc = rc1;
00155         }
00156 
00157 out:
00158         return rc;
00159 }
00160 
00161 static int mdt_getxattr_all(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00162                             struct mdt_body *reqbody, struct mdt_body *repbody,
00163                             struct lu_buf *buf, struct md_object *next)
00164 {
00165         const struct lu_env *env = info->mti_env;
00166         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00167         struct mdt_export_data *med = mdt_req2med(req);
00168         struct lu_ucred        *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
00169         char *v, *b, *eadatahead, *eadatatail;
00170         __u32 *sizes;
00171         int eadatasize, eavallen = 0, eavallens = 0, rc;
00172 
00173         ENTRY;
00174 
00175         /*
00176          * The format of the pill is the following:
00177          * EADATA:      attr1\0attr2\0...attrn\0
00178          * EAVALS:      val1val2...valn
00179          * EAVALS_LENS: 4,4,...4
00180          */
00181 
00182         eadatahead = buf->lb_buf;
00183 
00184         /* Fill out EADATA first */
00185         rc = mo_xattr_list(env, next, buf);
00186         if (rc < 0)
00187                 GOTO(out_shrink, rc);
00188 
00189         eadatasize = rc;
00190         eadatatail = eadatahead + eadatasize;
00191 
00192         v = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_EAVALS);
00193         sizes = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_EAVALS_LENS);
00194 
00195         /* Fill out EAVALS and EAVALS_LENS */
00196         for (b = eadatahead; b < eadatatail; b += strlen(b) + 1, v += rc) {
00197                 buf->lb_buf = v;
00198                 buf->lb_len = reqbody->mbo_eadatasize - eavallen;
00199                 rc = mdt_getxattr_one(info, b, next, buf, med, uc);
00200                 if (rc < 0)
00201                         GOTO(out_shrink, rc);
00202 
00203                 sizes[eavallens] = rc;
00204                 eavallens++;
00205                 eavallen += rc;
00206         }
00207 
00208 out_shrink:
00209         if (rc < 0) {
00210                 eadatasize = 0;
00211                 eavallens = 0;
00212                 eavallen = 0;
00213         }
00214         repbody->mbo_aclsize = eavallen;
00215         repbody->mbo_max_mdsize = eavallens;
00216 
00217         req_capsule_shrink(info->mti_pill, &RMF_EAVALS, eavallen, RCL_SERVER);
00218         req_capsule_shrink(info->mti_pill, &RMF_EAVALS_LENS,
00219                            eavallens * sizeof(__u32), RCL_SERVER);
00220         req_capsule_shrink(info->mti_pill, &RMF_EADATA, eadatasize, RCL_SERVER);
00221 
00222         if (rc >= 0)
00223                 RETURN(eadatasize);
00224         return rc;
00225 }
00226 
00227 int mdt_getxattr(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00228 {
00229         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00230         struct mdt_export_data *med = mdt_req2med(req);
00231         struct lu_ucred        *uc  = lu_ucred(info->mti_env);
00232         struct mdt_body        *reqbody;
00233         struct mdt_body        *repbody = NULL;
00234         struct md_object       *next;
00235         struct lu_buf          *buf;
00236         __u32                   remote = exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp);
00237         __u32                   perm;
00238         int                     easize, rc;
00239         u64                     valid;
00240         ENTRY;
00241 
00242         LASSERT(info->mti_object != NULL);
00243         LASSERT(lu_object_assert_exists(&info->mti_object->mot_obj));
00244 
00245         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "getxattr "DFID"\n", PFID(&info->mti_body->mbo_fid1));
00246 
00247         reqbody = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00248         if (reqbody == NULL)
00249                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00250 
00251         rc = mdt_init_ucred(info, reqbody);
00252         if (rc)
00253                 RETURN(err_serious(rc));
00254 
00255         next = mdt_object_child(info->mti_object);
00256 
00257         if (info->mti_body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLRMTRGETFACL) {
00258                 if (unlikely(!remote))
00259                         GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-EINVAL));
00260 
00261                 perm = mdt_identity_get_perm(uc->uc_identity, remote,
00262                                              req->rq_peer.nid);
00263                 if (!(perm & CFS_RMTACL_PERM))
00264                         GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-EPERM));
00265 
00266                 rc = mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, next, NULL,
00267                                    MAY_RGETFACL);
00268                 if (rc)
00269                         GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
00270         }
00271 
00272         easize = mdt_getxattr_pack_reply(info);
00273         if (easize < 0)
00274                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(easize));
00275 
00276         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00277         LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
00278 
00279         /* No need further getxattr. */
00280         if (easize == 0 || reqbody->mbo_eadatasize == 0)
00281                 GOTO(out, rc = easize);
00282 
00283         buf = &info->mti_buf;
00284         buf->lb_buf = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00285         buf->lb_len = easize;
00286 
00287         valid = info->mti_body->mbo_valid & (OBD_MD_FLXATTR | OBD_MD_FLXATTRLS);
00288 
00289         if (valid == OBD_MD_FLXATTR) {
00290                 char *xattr_name = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill,
00291                                                           &RMF_NAME);
00292                 rc = mdt_getxattr_one(info, xattr_name, next, buf, med, uc);
00293         } else if (valid == OBD_MD_FLXATTRLS) {
00294                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "listxattr\n");
00295 
00296                 rc = mo_xattr_list(info->mti_env, next, buf);
00297                 if (rc < 0)
00298                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "listxattr failed: %d\n", rc);
00299         } else if (valid == OBD_MD_FLXATTRALL) {
00300                 rc = mdt_getxattr_all(info, reqbody, repbody,
00301                                       buf, next);
00302         } else
00303                 LBUG();
00304 
00305         EXIT;
00306 out:
00307         if (rc >= 0) {
00308                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_GETXATTR);
00309                 repbody->mbo_eadatasize = rc;
00310                 rc = 0;
00311         }
00312         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00313         return rc;
00314 }
00315 
00316 static int mdt_rmtlsetfacl(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00317                            struct md_object *next,
00318                            const char *xattr_name,
00319                            ext_acl_xattr_header *header,
00320                            posix_acl_xattr_header **out)
00321 {
00322         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00323         struct mdt_export_data *med = mdt_req2med(req);
00324         struct lu_ucred        *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
00325         struct lu_buf          *buf = &info->mti_buf;
00326         int                     rc;
00327         ENTRY;
00328 
00329         rc = lustre_ext_acl_xattr_id2server(uc, med->med_idmap, header);
00330         if (rc)
00331                 RETURN(rc);
00332 
00333         rc = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env, next, &LU_BUF_NULL, xattr_name);
00334         if (rc == -ENODATA)
00335                 rc = 0;
00336         else if (rc < 0)
00337                 RETURN(rc);
00338 
00339         buf->lb_len = rc;
00340         if (buf->lb_len > 0) {
00341                 OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(buf->lb_buf, buf->lb_len);
00342                 if (unlikely(buf->lb_buf == NULL))
00343                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00344 
00345                 rc = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env, next, buf, xattr_name);
00346                 if (rc < 0) {
00347                         CERROR("getxattr failed: %d\n", rc);
00348                         GOTO(_out, rc);
00349                 }
00350         } else
00351                 buf->lb_buf = NULL;
00352 
00353         rc = lustre_acl_xattr_merge2posix((posix_acl_xattr_header *)(buf->lb_buf),
00354                                           buf->lb_len, header, out);
00355         EXIT;
00356 
00357 _out:
00358         if (rc <= 0 && buf->lb_buf != NULL)
00359                 OBD_FREE_LARGE(buf->lb_buf, buf->lb_len);
00360         return rc;
00361 }
00362 
00363 int mdt_reint_setxattr(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00364                        struct mdt_lock_handle *unused)
00365 {
00366         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00367         struct lu_ucred         *uc  = lu_ucred(info->mti_env);
00368         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh;
00369         const struct lu_env     *env  = info->mti_env;
00370         struct lu_buf           *buf  = &info->mti_buf;
00371         struct mdt_reint_record *rr   = &info->mti_rr;
00372         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00373         struct lu_attr          *attr = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
00374         struct mdt_object       *obj;
00375         struct md_object        *child;
00376         struct obd_export       *exp = info->mti_exp;
00377         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00378         __u64                    valid = attr->la_valid;
00379         const char              *xattr_name = rr->rr_name.ln_name;
00380         int                      xattr_len = rr->rr_eadatalen;
00381         __u64                    lockpart;
00382         int                      rc;
00383         posix_acl_xattr_header  *new_xattr = NULL;
00384         __u32                    remote = exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp);
00385         __u32                    perm;
00386         ENTRY;
00387 
00388         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "setxattr for "DFID": %s %s\n", PFID(rr->rr_fid1),
00389                valid & OBD_MD_FLXATTR ? "set" : "remove", xattr_name);
00390 
00391         if (info->mti_dlm_req)
00392                 ldlm_request_cancel(req, info->mti_dlm_req, 0, LATF_SKIP);
00393 
00394         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_SETXATTR))
00395                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00396 
00397         rc = mdt_init_ucred_reint(info);
00398         if (rc != 0)
00399                 RETURN(rc);
00400 
00401         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLRMTRSETFACL) {
00402                 if (unlikely(!remote))
00403                         GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-EINVAL));
00404 
00405                 perm = mdt_identity_get_perm(uc->uc_identity, remote,
00406                                              req->rq_peer.nid);
00407                 if (!(perm & CFS_RMTACL_PERM))
00408                         GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-EPERM));
00409         }
00410 
00411         if (strncmp(xattr_name, XATTR_USER_PREFIX,
00412                     sizeof(XATTR_USER_PREFIX) - 1) == 0) {
00413                 if (!(exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_XATTR))
00414                         GOTO(out, rc = -EOPNOTSUPP);
00415         } else if (strncmp(xattr_name, XATTR_TRUSTED_PREFIX,
00416                     sizeof(XATTR_TRUSTED_PREFIX) - 1) == 0) {
00417 
00418                 if (!md_capable(mdt_ucred(info), CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN))
00419                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
00420 
00421                 if (strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_LOV) == 0 ||
00422                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_LMA) == 0 ||
00423                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_LMV) == 0 ||
00424                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_LINK) == 0 ||
00425                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_FID) == 0 ||
00426                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_VERSION) == 0 ||
00427                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_SOM) == 0 ||
00428                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_HSM) == 0 ||
00429                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_LFSCK_NAMESPACE) == 0)
00430                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00431         } else if ((valid & OBD_MD_FLXATTR) &&
00432                    (strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS) == 0 ||
00433                     strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_ACL_DEFAULT) == 0)) {
00434 
00435                 /* currently lustre limit acl access size */
00436                 if (xattr_len > LUSTRE_POSIX_ACL_MAX_SIZE)
00437                         GOTO(out, rc = -ERANGE);
00438 
00439                 rc = nodemap_map_acl(nodemap, rr->rr_eadata, xattr_len,
00440                                      NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS);
00441                 if (rc < 0)
00442                         GOTO(out, rc);
00443 
00444                 /* ACLs were mapped out, return an error so the user knows */
00445                 if (rc != xattr_len)
00446                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
00447         }
00448 
00449         lockpart = MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
00450         /* Revoke all clients' lookup lock, since the access
00451          * permissions for this inode is changed when ACL_ACCESS is
00452          * set. This isn't needed for ACL_DEFAULT, since that does
00453          * not change the access permissions of this inode, nor any
00454          * other existing inodes. It is setting the ACLs inherited
00455          * by new directories/files at create time. */
00456         /* We need revoke both LOOKUP|PERM lock here, see mdt_attr_set. */
00457         if (!strcmp(xattr_name, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS))
00458                 lockpart |= MDS_INODELOCK_PERM | MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP;
00459         /* We need to take the lock on behalf of old clients so that newer
00460          * clients flush their xattr caches */
00461         else
00462                 lockpart |= MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR;
00463 
00464         lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
00465         /* ACLs were sent to clients under LCK_CR locks, so taking LCK_EX
00466          * to cancel them. */
00467         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh, LCK_EX);
00468         obj = mdt_object_find_lock(info, rr->rr_fid1, lh, lockpart);
00469         if (IS_ERR(obj))
00470                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
00471 
00472         tgt_vbr_obj_set(env, mdt_obj2dt(obj));
00473         rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, obj, 0);
00474         if (rc)
00475                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00476 
00477         if (unlikely(!(valid & OBD_MD_FLCTIME))) {
00478                 /* This isn't strictly an error, but all current clients
00479                  * should set OBD_MD_FLCTIME when setting attributes. */
00480                 CWARN("%s: client miss to set OBD_MD_FLCTIME when "
00481                       "setxattr %s: [object "DFID"] [valid "LPU64"]\n",
00482                       mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), xattr_name,
00483                       PFID(rr->rr_fid1), valid);
00484                 attr->la_ctime = cfs_time_current_sec();
00485         }
00486         attr->la_valid = LA_CTIME;
00487         child = mdt_object_child(obj);
00488         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLXATTR) {
00489                 void   *xattr = rr->rr_eadata;
00490                 int     flags = 0;
00491 
00492                 if (valid & OBD_MD_FLRMTLSETFACL) {
00493                         if (unlikely(!remote))
00494                                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EINVAL);
00495 
00496                         xattr_len = mdt_rmtlsetfacl(info, child, xattr_name,
00497                                                     xattr, &new_xattr);
00498                         if (xattr_len < 0)
00499                                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = xattr_len);
00500 
00501                         xattr = new_xattr;
00502                 }
00503 
00504                 if (attr->la_flags & XATTR_REPLACE)
00505                         flags |= LU_XATTR_REPLACE;
00506 
00507                 if (attr->la_flags & XATTR_CREATE)
00508                         flags |= LU_XATTR_CREATE;
00509 
00510                 mdt_fail_write(env, info->mti_mdt->mdt_bottom,
00511                                OBD_FAIL_MDS_SETXATTR_WRITE);
00512 
00513                 buf->lb_buf = xattr;
00514                 buf->lb_len = xattr_len;
00515                 rc = mo_xattr_set(env, child, buf, xattr_name, flags);
00516                 /* update ctime after xattr changed */
00517                 if (rc == 0) {
00518                         ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_PERM_BYPASS;
00519                         mo_attr_set(env, child, ma);
00520                 }
00521         } else if (valid & OBD_MD_FLXATTRRM) {
00522                 rc = mo_xattr_del(env, child, xattr_name);
00523                 /* update ctime after xattr changed */
00524                 if (rc == 0) {
00525                         ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_PERM_BYPASS;
00526                         mo_attr_set(env, child, ma);
00527                 }
00528         } else {
00529                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "valid bits: "LPX64"\n", valid);
00530                 rc = -EINVAL;
00531         }
00532         if (rc == 0)
00533                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_SETXATTR);
00534 
00535         EXIT;
00536 out_unlock:
00537         mdt_object_unlock_put(info, obj, lh, rc);
00538         if (unlikely(new_xattr != NULL))
00539                 lustre_posix_acl_xattr_free(new_xattr, xattr_len);
00540 out:
00541         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00542         return rc;
00543 }
